Uses of Interface
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver.ClientEndpoint

Packages that use ClientEndpoint
org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver Provides the classes to create a TCP / UDP socket server that communicates using custom serialized Java messages objects. 
 

Uses of ClientEndpoint in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver
 

Classes in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver that implement ClientEndpoint
(package private)  class ClientEndpointTCP
          Simply delegates all calls to the Socket.
(package private)  class ClientEndpointUDP
          Client endpoint that handles UDP traffic and maintains a list of known and new datagram messages.
 

Fields in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver declared as ClientEndpoint
private  ClientEndpoint ClientContext.clientEndpoint
          Client to which this context is dedicated to.
 

Methods in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver that return ClientEndpoint
(package private)  ClientEndpoint ServerEndpointUDP.getClientEndpoint()
          Returns a new client endpoint in case a datagram packet is received from an unknown client.
(package private)  ClientEndpoint ServerEndpointTCP.getClientEndpoint()
          Returns a new ClientEndpointTCP Socket decorator (received from ServerSocket.accept()).
(package private) abstract  ClientEndpoint ServerEndpoint.getClientEndpoint()
           
(package private)  ClientEndpoint ClientContext.getClientEndpoint()
           
 

Constructors in org.codemonkey.swiftsocketserver with parameters of type ClientEndpoint
ClientContext(ClientEndpoint clientEndpoint)
          Stores the given client endpoint and saves its InetAddress for later use (in case the endpoint is being closed and we lose the ability the query for the InetAddress).
